name: DuelEM
description:
This is a Online Top Down Shooter game I have been working on for a while now

Changes V1.1:
-2 New Single Player Enemies
-Enemies Shoot Green Bullets
-You cant Respawn in Single-player
BUG FIXES:
-Random Emerald Drop chance
-You cant dash out the map anymore
-Mines deal damage to yourself now (watch out!)
-Enemies can no longer damage themselves
